韜.definition: bow case or scabbard; to hide; military strategy

韜光養晦.definition: to conceal one's strengths and bide one's time (idiom); to hide one's light under a bushel

韜略.definition: military strategy; military tactics; originally refers to military classics Six Secret Teachings 六韜|六韬[Liu4 tao1] and Three Strategies 三略[San1 lu:e4]
